meta.title: VIGOR Memberclient
meta.keywords: vig, eosdac, member, eos, dac, token, custodian, blockchain, crypto, decentralized, autonomous
meta.noscript: To view this webpage you need to have javascript enabled

index.description_p1: VIGOR is a decentralized autonomous community which means it is owned and operated by the token holders who agree to the constitution and register as members of the community.
index.description_p2: This member client will allow you to read and sign the constitution, register as a member, submit worker proposals, register as a custodian candidate, vote on custodians, transfer tokens, and more. Join us by signing the constitution and the DAC will send you VIG tokens enabling you to register as a candidate.
index.discord_description: VIGOR is building vUSD a crypto-backed stablecoin on the EOS blockchain powered by our VIG token. Telegram is where we bring our skills together and coordinate our activites.

verify_token.copied_to_clipboard: Copied the token to your clipboard!
verify_token.description: You've been redirected to this page to pair an eos account with a discord id. Please sign the message and go back to the discord bot. Run the command $verify.
verify_token.title: Verify token
